pkgmetadata.longdescription: Case Classification and Selection Based on Regression Results // Researchers doing a mixed-methods analysis (nested analysis as developed by Lieberman (2005) doi:10.1017/S0003055405051762) can use the package for the classification of cases and case selection using results of a linear regression. One can designate cases as typical, deviant, extreme and pathway case and use different case selection strategies for the choice of a case belonging to one of these types.
